casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Laguta, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Laguta (1995), 72 Ohio St.3d 245.]

(No. 94-2411 Submitted February 7, 1995 Decided May 24, 1995.) *246Stephanie Tubbs Jones, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Diane Smilanick, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. George A. Laguta, pro se. Per Curiam.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed for the reasons stated in its opinion.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur.
